pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fit Additive Hazards Models for Survival Analysis // Contains tools to fit the additive hazards model to data from a cohort, random sampling, two-phase Bernoulli sampling and two-phase finite population sampling, as well as calibration tool to incorporate phase I auxiliary information into the two-phase data model fitting. This package provides regression parameter estimates and their model-based and robust standard errors. It also offers tools to make prediction of individual specific hazards.
